comment.author: 20599166@N03
comment._content: I saw a "jingle dress" dancer at one of the Pow Wows and I really loved it.  What a wonderful activity for the women and children.

comment.author: 54669757@N06
comment._content: Great photo.  I would love to reprint in my online magazine. Please contact me at stephanie.meade at gmail.com for further info.  Thank you!

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/54669757@N06] Hi, inculture18! If you'd like to get in touch with the National Museum of the American Indian (NMAI) regarding photo collections, please email nmaiphotos@si.edu. Or visit the NMAI Ordering Information webpage to learn more about their photo services.
